sourceDesc.p: The contents of this document are generated from SOSOL.

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept - I'm pasting in Heilporn's comments for the finalizer: "Translation should perhaps be marked as being by A. Delattre and N. Gonis. Also, "andrismos" and "arithmion" will later need to be marked as "terms" from the glossar."

first submission of text to SoSOL. Note: l. 3: the editor does not include accents over Χοιακ and I am uncertain whether this should be Χοίακ or Χοιὰκ. Note: there is no punctuation in the original manuscript - this is included by the editor (and replicated here). Note: the translation is the editor's.

div.p: I have received from you, Saias, monk, from (the) andrismos of the 1st indiction, one-third of a nomisma of gold, total 1/3 arithmion. Choiak 6, indiction 1. I, Pinoution, wrote. (2nd hand) Victor agrees. (3rd hand) Ioannes, the teacher, agrees.
